title: Taking Rice and Miso to New Heights
detail_text: <:th_ch0005/>Kanata-san, Kanata-san! Rin made some onigiri for you nya!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>Uwaaah, so big~. Thank you, Rin-chan.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>Ehehe. Rin made it as a thank you for making me some delicious ramen! Rin talked to Kayochin about the ingredients, but Rin made the rest of the onigiri myself.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>Both you and Hanayo-chan worked hard on these, huh? Thanks for the food~.... *Munch Munch*.... Hnn, It’s delicious! You’re really good at making onigiri, Rin-chan. These might be even better than mine~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>Eh!? Really!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>Yeah, really. Here, try a bite~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>*Munch*.... You’re right! The onigiri Rin made is really good nya!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>The various stuffings make it even more enjoyable~. Will you teach me how to make the stuffings~?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>Of course nya! Rin will invite Kayochin too! We’ll make lots of them and have an onigiri party nya!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>That sounds great~! Then, Kanata will make some miso soup to go perfectly with the onigiri~♪<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
